alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:33PM EST until December 21 at 3:08AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. Carrabassett River At North Anson affecting Franklin and Somerset Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at North Sidney. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Portions of Lithgow Street in Winslow floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 27.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
